description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Lille vs Lens in the Ligue 1
title: Lille vs Lens: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Lille vs Lens: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 3 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Jeremy Agbonifo (Lens) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Anass Zaroury with a cross.
Post
Attempt missed. M'Bala Nzola (Lens) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jeremy Agbonifo with a cross.
